headline: CenterPoint Energy delivers on its commitment to restore essentially all customers by end of day Thursday: More than 60,000 customers now have power again following Sunday’s winter storm, roughly 700 customers remain out on Thursday evening
summary: CenterPoint Energy delivers on its commitment to restore essentially all customers by end of day Thursday: More than 60,000 customers now have power again following Sunday's winter storm, roughly 700...
